Text:
Bra att alla lägger upp torrents. Men är den här dokumentären inriktad på att i princip dementera att Auschwitz existerade eller att det inte var så farlig? Eller hur är den upplagd? Har itne mycket till övers för antisemitisk skit, å jag blir rasande när folk ens har mage att ifrågasätta att förintelsen tog plats. 

/Bernadotte
jude....

For the record, I uploaded this for the only reason that it is a very controversial topic.  I am neither Anti-Semetic nor Pro-Aryan. However, I do keep an open mind about such topics and am willing to listen to all sides of an argument. 

Only then can an informed opinion be reached.....

Yeah, we also need more torrents about whether

just what is in dispute?   concentration camps?
the fact they were death camps (and not 'work' 
camps?)  a dispute over deaths of X million jews, Y 
million gypsies, Z million communists/gays/russian 
POWs?

no historian of any reputation disputes any of these
facts.  its just "self-taught" revisionist kooks who 
find these truths so unacceptable they warp their
own vision of reality to adapt to outrageous falsehoods.

theres perhaps no historical fact more thoroughly 
verified than nazi deathcamps in WW2.

You, my good man, stand free to believe what you want.  If you choose to live in your own little world and deny the cruelties that happened to jews during the war, it is your choice.  There is however, plenty of evidence that these poor people were treated worse than anyone can imagine, so why would anyone go into the effort of making a crap so-called "documentary" like this?  The worst part is that it is called "the truth" about auschwitz.. 

Them neo-nazis should be put in dark cells never to see daylight again until they thought properly through what the regime they believe in stands for.

Hell, not even the people that made this movie are stupid enough to believe this crap! (But the guy that uploaded probably is... ) If you're interested in facts: http://www.faqs.org/faqs/holocaust/auschwitz/part01/

For those interested in history, instead of infantile neonazi propaganda: 
http://thepiratebay.org/details.php?id=3474446
(BBC documentary)

Or just because the truth is rather inconvenient and the world history may have to be corrected.
And God save Israel if they have to give the Holocaust income back...

Good work , many thanks from Sweden!
One day the world will know that Adolf Hitler was right!
The truth is out there!

I am neither Anti-Semetic nor Pro-Aryan. However, I do keep an open mind about such topics and am willing to listen to all sides of an argument.

Having an open mind with regards to Jewish politics is what Anti-Semitism is all about. If you do not want to be labelled Anti-Semitic, you must always support Jewish political views as a matter of principal.

I don't know a lot about the Holocaust but I do know that most people's knowledge of WWII is incorrect. What we take as the truth is mostly wartime propaganda that gradually became accepted history. You do not need to listen to loony conspiracy theorists to work this out. Just read reputable history books with a critical mind.
